snippet.title: Trine Enchanted Edition Trailer
snippet.description:
Trine Enchanted Edition is a remake of the original Trine, built using the Trine 2 engine. Trine features three Heroes: Amadeus the Wizard, Pontius the Knight and Zoya the Thief, who make their way through dangers untold in an enchanting fairytale world of great castles and strange machinery, featuring physics-based puzzles, beautiful sights and online co-op. 

Trine Enchanted Edition is now available:

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/35700
GOG: http://www.gog.com/game/trine_enchanted_edition
Humble: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/trine_storefront

Most notable new features in the Enchanted Edition:
- Online co-op multiplayer
- Stunning new visual effects and graphics
- Mid-level saving

Also coming to the Wii U and PS4 later in 2014!
